availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of William M. Owen and Tabitha Owen. Married to Sarah Ann McPherson Owen. Father of Millard D. Owen, Mary E. Owen, and James O. Owen. Attended school in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1850. Convicted of assaulting Albert G. Howard in Daviess County in 1859. Farmer in Daviess County in 1860. Farmer in Daviess County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 1, p. 388B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 1, p. 811.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, Upper Town Precinct, p. 317B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Daviess County, KY, July 1863, p. 51.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994033, Daviess County Births.
"Mary E. Owen," Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 13000.
KYR-0001-020-0379.
